title: SHAPESHIFTER FREE HORROR STORY
description:
REPOSTED - 

Here is a free short HORROR STORY written by Joe Augustyn who was the creator of the first two movies in the NIGHT OF THE DEMONS series. It is excerpted from his first novel, about a girl who gets revenge on a gang of boys who badly abused her and left her for dead. With the aid of a witch she becomes a shapeshifter. It's gory and suspenseful. 

If you like this story please buy the book to support him, since he was SCREWED out of his movie royalties by the executive assholes who controlled the distribution of his movies.
